UNTDID3207Type.title: ISO_ISOTwoletterCountryCode_SecondEdition2006.TXT
UNTDID3207Type.description:
Identification of the name of the country or other geographical entity as defined in ISO 3166-1.

Code list responsible agency:
ISO

Code list responsible agency name:
International Organization for Standardization

Code list responsible agency code:
5

Code list:
3166-1

Code list name:
Country code

Code list version:
2020

Code list issue date:
CL 2020-08
